newsitem.title: USA: Sioux City cattle steady/firm - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Sioux City cattle steady/firm - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was active. Compared with last Monday, slaughter steers and heifers traded steady to firm. Increased percentage of Choice grade.
Steers - select and choice 2-3, 1150-1325 lbs 67.00-68.00, reputation 68.25-68.35, drug free choice 1276 lbs 69.50. Select 1075-1300 lbs 63.00-66.00. Returning to feedlot 1100-1250 lbs 55.50-60.00.
Heifers - select and choice 2-3, 1050-1250 lbs 66.00-67.75, reputation 1125 lbs 67.85, drug free 1070-1192 lbs 68.25-69.50. Select 2-3, 1025-1200 lbs 63.00-65.50. Returning to feedlot 55.50-60.00.
